thread.title: BRIEF-Sears Auto Centers Says Working With Amazon To Provide Tire Installation, Balancing Service For Customers

title: BRIEF-Sears Auto Centers Says Working With Amazon To Provide Tire Installation, Balancing Service For Customers

organizations.name: brief-sears auto centers says working with amazon to provide tire installation
brief-sears auto centers says working with amazon
balancing service for customers reuters staff

text:
May 9, 2018 / 2:47 PM / Updated 7 minutes ago BRIEF-Sears Auto Centers Says Working With Amazon To Provide Tire Installation, Balancing Service For Customers Reuters Staff 1 Min Read
May 9 (Reuters) - Sears Auto Centers:
* SAYS WORKING WITH AMAZON.COM TO PROVIDE FULL-SERVICE TIRE INSTALLATION, BALANCING FOR CUSTOMERS WHO BUY ANY BRAND OF TIRES ON AMAZON
* SAYS NEW SERVICE WITH AMAZON WILL BE ROLLING OUT TO CUSTOMERS ACROSS U.S. OVER COMING WEEKS Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
